attributes.action: Reform education - After leaving education people must work, continue education or take an apprenticeship.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too many young people are leaving school with no direction or skills. There needs to be a system where a youth cannot leave education to become unemployed without good reason. Students should make the choice early whether to learn a academic or vocational subject. This could be similar to the system in Finland and various other countries.
